label: XHEDocument
comment: A collection of data for electronic matter that provides XHE (Exchange Header Envelope) information or evidence.

objectProperties.comment: The date, time, date time or other date time value of the creation of this XHE document.
The identifier for this XHE document.
A recipient party for this XHE document.
A context scope for this XHE document.
The sender party for this XHE document.
The indication of whether or not this XHE document is a test .
The UUID (Universally Unique IDentifier) of this XHE document.

referencedBy.comment: The document metadata for this XHE envelope.
